price: 31 Puis, de retour chez eux, ils se plaisaient encore à les railler.
arabic: وَإِذَا ٱنقَلَبُوٓاْ إِلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِهِمُ ٱنقَلَبُواْ فَكِهِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā inqalabū ilā ahlihimu inqalabū fakihīna
